name: GlucoseLabTestCapillaryMolesPerVolume
title: Glucose Lab Test Capillary Moles per Volume
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains lab tests commonly used for a blood glucose test.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who had a lab test on a source of capillary blood glucose. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to 'Laboratory Test, Result' or 'Laboratory Test, Order' datatype.),(Inclusion Criteria: Glucose lab test using the source of capillary blood based on a measurement scale of Moles/volume.),(Exclusion Criteria: Glucose lab test using the source of blood/serum/plasma blood or any other source of blood)
